14
15#ifndef ISC_THREAD_H
16#define ISC_THREAD_H 1
17
18/*! \file */
19
20#include <pthread.h>
21
22#if defined(HAVE_PTHREAD_NP_H)
23#include <pthread_np.h>
24#endif
25
26#include <isc/lang.h>
27#include <isc/result.h>
28
29ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
30
31typedef pthread_t isc_thread_t;
32typedef void * isc_threadresult_t;
33typedef void * isc_threadarg_t;
34typedef isc_threadresult_t (*isc_threadfunc_t)(isc_threadarg_t);
35typedef pthread_key_t isc_thread_key_t;
36
37isc_result_t
38isc_thread_create(isc_threadfunc_t, isc_threadarg_t, isc_thread_t *);
39
40void
41isc_thread_setconcurrency(unsigned int level);
42
43void
44isc_thread_yield(void);
45
46void
47isc_thread_setname(isc_thread_t thread, const char *name);
48
49isc_result_t
50isc_thread_setaffinity(int cpu);
51
52/* XXX We could do fancier error handling... */
53
54#define isc_thread_join(t, rp) \
55 ((pthread_join((t), (rp)) == 0) ? \
56 ISC_R_SUCCESS : ISC_R_UNEXPECTED)
57
58#define isc_thread_self \
59 (unsigned long)pthread_self
60
61#define isc_thread_key_create pthread_key_create
62#define isc_thread_key_getspecific pthread_getspecific
63#define isc_thread_key_setspecific pthread_setspecific
64#define isc_thread_key_delete pthread_key_delete
65
66ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
67
68#endif /* ISC_THREAD_H */
69
